abstract: A service that had an edgy, underground feel to it will now go mainstream with a larger membership. But it could help produce more hits.
snippet: A service that had an edgy, underground feel to it will now go mainstream with a larger membership. But it could help produce more hits.
lead_paragraph: 8:34 p.m. | Updated What do "Slumdog Millionaire," "Juno" and "The Kings Speech" have in common? They all started as unproduced scripts on the Hollywood Black List.

headline.main: Hollywood's Black List Gets an Upgrade
